title: Innovating Language Education with Smart Environments: IMS Learning Design Standard-Based Content Development

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary educational theory and fundamental concepts of language pedagogy
context.additional_context: Strengthening the capacity of pre-service and in-service teachers to build smart technology-based language education environments

learning_goals: Language education content can be systematically designed by applying the IMS Learning Design (IMS LD) standard
Context-aware educational materials can be developed and operated using smartphone-based NFC technology
Formative assessment tools can be designed and applied to promote learner engagement in smart environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
